question: Recently, Narendra Modi Government installed plaque with the name and quote of which of the following personalities at cellular jail?
explanation: Narendra Modi Government reinstalled plaque with the name and quote of Veer Savarkar at Cellular Jail in Andaman and Nicobar Islands. The plaque was first installed in 2004 in the Atal Behari Vajpayee government. It was removed soon after UPA government came to power at the Centre.
